Class TextEntity

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.core.YaegerGameObject
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.YaegerEntity
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.ShapeEntity<javafx.scene.text.Text>
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl.TextEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rotatable, Effectable, Anchorable, Bounded, DragRepositoryAccessor, EventInitiator, GameNode, Placeable, Removable, SceneChild, Initializable, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider, TimerListProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicTextEntity
public class TextEntity extends ShapeEntity<javafx.scene.text.Text>
A TextEntity can be used to display a line of text on a YaegerScene.

For the displayed text, either a system-font can be used, through the use of the Font class, or a custom font, through the use if the class CustomFont. The custom font, should then be a *.ttf file and placed within the resources/ folder. When placed in a sub-folder of resource/, this folder should be open through the module-descriptor.

    • setFont

      public void setFont(javafx.scene.text.Font font)
      Set the Font to be used. A Font encapsulates multiple properties.

      To only set the font type and size: setFont(Font.FONT ("Verdana", 20));

      It is also possible to set more properties: setFont(Font.FONT("Verdana", FontWeight.BOLD, 70));

      Parameters:
      font - the Font to be used

    • getFont
